content.question: Which of the following best explains why the combustion reactions represented in the table are exothermic?

choices.label: The number of bonds in the reactant molecules is greater than the number of bonds in the product molecules.
The number of bonds in the reactant molecules is less than the number of bonds in the product molecules.
The energy required to break the bonds in the reactants is greater than the energy released in forming the bonds in the products.
The energy required to break the bonds in the reactants is less than the energy released in forming the bonds in the products.

content.answer: The energy required to break the bonds in the reactants is less than the energy released in forming the bonds in the products.

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
